subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Steroids
lead_paragraph: For the next three days, the Mets have a front-row seat to watch Barry Bonds, baseball’s most polarizing figure, make his way toward Hank Aaron’s home run record.
snippet: For the next three days, the Mets have a front-row seat to watch Barry Bonds, baseball’s most polarizing figure, make his way toward Hank Aaron’s home run record.
